mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.capitaltype AS "capitaltype ", a.currency AS "currency", a.exchangerate AS "exchangerate", a.capprop AS "capprop", a.capamt AS "capamt", a.jstzamt AS "jstzamt", a.ldtzamt AS "ldtzamt", a.pkfundssrc AS "fea_fundssrc.id", a.remarks AS "remarks"
LEFT JOIN fea_fundssrc b ON b.id = a.pkfundssrc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_fundssrc_b( id, del_flag, capitaltype , currency, exchangerate, capprop, capamt, jstzamt, ldtzamt, pkfundssrc, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{delFlag}, #{capitaltype }, #{currency}, #{exchangerate}, #{capprop}, #{capamt}, #{jstzamt}, #{ldtzamt}, #{fea_fundssrc.id}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_fundssrc_b SET capitaltype = #{capitaltype }, currency = #{currency}, exchangerate = #{exchangerate}, capprop = #{capprop}, capamt = #{capamt}, jstzamt = #{jstzamt}, ldtzamt = #{ldtzamt}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
